metadata.title: CVE-2024-37383 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
Roundcube Webmail before 1.5.7 and 1.6.x before 1.6.7 allows XSS via SVGanimate attributes.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-37383` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

roundcube - 1.5.0+dfsg.1-2ubuntu0.1~esm3
roundcube-core - 1.5.0+dfsg.1-2ubuntu0.1~esm3
roundcube-mysql - 1.5.0+dfsg.1-2ubuntu0.1~esm3
roundcube-pgsql - 1.5.0+dfsg.1-2ubuntu0.1~esm3
roundcube-plugins - 1.5.0+dfsg.1-2ubuntu0.1~esm3
roundcube-sqlite3 - 1.5.0+dfsg.1-2ubuntu0.1~esm3
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: roundcube package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.5.0+dfsg.1-2ubuntu0.1~esm3').
